summary: A fast test suite that validates the core functionality and performance optimizations of a video‑to‑video generation pipeline, using lightweight dummy components and inputs to check attention slicing, callback handling, fused QKV projections, inference correctness, batch consistency, and VAE tiling.
business_intent: Provide rapid confidence that the video generation pipeline operates correctly and efficiently, enabling reliable deployment and continuous integration for applications that rely on high‑quality video synthesis.
